document_data.caption: A map showing the Riftlake in the Great Rift.
document_data.name: Riftlake
document_data.mainbody: The '''Riftlake''' was a large body of water located in the [[Eastern Shaar]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The Riftlake sat in the middle of the [[Great Rift]] within the eastern Shaar. The lake was fed from the north by the [[River Shaar]] and from the south by the [[Rift River]].
